Credit: Dir: Allen Coulter With: Robert Pattinson, Emilie de Ravin, Caitlyn Rund
Outline: A romantic drama centered on two new lovers: Tyler, whose parents have split in the wake of his brother's suicide, and Ally, who lives each day to the fullest since witnessing her mother's murder.

Name: Never Let Me Go
Credit: Dir: Mark Romanek With: Keira Knightley, Carey Mulligan, Andrew Garfield
Outline: The lives of three friends, from their early school days into young adulthood.

Name: Sixteen Candles
Credit: Dir: John Hughes With: Molly Ringwald, Anthony Michael Hall, Justin Henry
Outline: A young girl's "sweet sixteenth" birthday becomes anything but special as she suffers from every embarrassment possible.

Name: The Messenger
Credit: Dir: Oren Moverman With: Ben Foster, Samantha Morton, Woody Harrelson
Outline: An American soldier struggles with an ethical dilemma when he becomes involved with a widow of a fallen officer.

Name: Last Tango in Paris
Credit: Dir: Bernardo Bertolucci With: Marlon Brando, Maria Schneider, Maria Michi
Outline: A young Parisian woman meets a middle-aged American businessman who demands their clandestine relationship be based only on sex.

Name: The Lobster

Name: It's Kind of a Funny Story

Outline: A clinically depressed teenager gets a new start after he checks himself into an adult psychiatric ward.

Name: Vicky Cristina Barcelona

Name: The 40-Year-Old Virgin

Name: Definitely, Maybe

Name: The Princess and the Frog

Name: Thirst
Credit: Dir: Chan-wook Park With: Kang-ho Song, Ok-bin Kim, Hae-suk Kim
Outline: Through a failed medical experiment, a priest is stricken with vampirism and is forced to abandon his ascetic ways.

Name: The Spectacular Now
Credit: Dir: James Ponsoldt With: Miles Teller, Shailene Woodley, Kyle Chandler
Outline: A hard-partying high school senior's philosophy on life changes when he meets the not-so-typical "nice girl."

Name: Angel-A
Credit: Dir: Luc Besson With: Rie Rasmussen, Jamel Debbouze, Gilbert Melki
Outline: A beautiful woman helps an inept scam artist get his game together.

Name: Moonstruck
Credit: Dir: Norman Jewison With: Cher, Nicolas Cage, Olympia Dukakis
Outline: Loretta Castorini, a book keeper from Brooklyn, New York, finds herself in a difficult situation when she falls for the brother of the man she has agreed to marry.

Name: Bitter Moon
Credit: Dir: Roman Polanski With: Hugh Grant, Kristin Scott Thomas, Emmanuelle Seigner

Name: Meet Joe Black

Name: Far from the Madding Crowd

Name: Enchanted

Credit: Dir: Kevin Lima With: Amy Adams, Susan Sarandon, James Marsden
Outline: A princess, who is prepared to be wed, is sent away to New York by an evil queen, where she falls in love with a lawyer.

Name: Bull Durham

Outline: A fan who has an affair with one minor-league baseball player each season meets an up-and-coming pitcher and the experienced catcher assigned to him.

Name: Welcome to the Sticks

Outline: A French public servant from Provence is banished to the far North. Strongly prejudiced against this cold and inhospitable place, he leaves his family behind to relocate temporarily there, with the firm intent to quickly come back.

Name: Easy A
Credit: Dir: Will Gluck With: Emma Stone, Amanda Bynes, Penn Badgley
Outline: A clean-cut high school student relies on the school's rumor mill to advance her social and financial standing.

Name: Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi
Credit: Dir: Aditya Chopra With: Shah Rukh Khan, Vinay Pathak, Anushka Sharma

Name: Becoming Jane

Outline: A biographical portrait of a pre-fame Jane Austen and her romance with a young Irishman.

Name: Anastasia

Credit: Dir: Don Bluth, Gary Goldman With: Meg Ryan, John Cusack, Christopher Lloyd

Name: The Time Traveler's Wife
Credit: Dir: Robert Schwentke With: Eric Bana, Rachel McAdams, Ron Livingston
Outline: A romantic drama about a Chicago librarian with a gene that causes him to involuntarily time travel, and the complications it creates for his marriage.

Name: The Longest Ride

Outline: The lives of a young couple intertwine with a much older man, as he reflects back on a past love.

Name: The Railway Man

Name: Perfect Sense

Outline: A chef and a scientist fall in love as an epidemic begins to rob people of their sensory perceptions.

Name: About a Boy
Credit: Dir: Chris Weitz, Paul Weitz With: Hugh Grant, Nicholas Hoult, Toni Collette
Outline: A cynical, immature young man is taught how to act like a grown-up by a little boy.

Name: There's Something About Mary
Credit: Dir: Bobby Farrelly, Peter Farrelly With: Ben Stiller, Cameron Diaz, Matt Dillon
Outline: A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from highschool, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.

Name: Away We Go

Name: No Way Out
Genre: Action | Crime | Drama | Mystery | Romance | Thriller
Credit: Dir: Roger Donaldson With: Kevin Costner, Gene Hackman, Sean Young
Outline: A coverup and witchhunt occur after a politician accidentally kills his mistress.

Name: Monster's Ball

Outline: After a family tragedy, a racist prison guard reexamines his attitudes while falling in love with the African American wife of the last prisoner he executed.

Name: Confessions of a Dangerous Mind

Name: The Merchant of Venice

Name: Mighty Aphrodite

Outline: When he discovers his adopted son is a genius, a New York sportswriter seeks out the boy's birth mother: a prostitute.

Name: Four Weddings and a Funeral
Credit: Dir: Mike Newell With: Hugh Grant, Andie MacDowell, James Fleet
Outline: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

Name: Secretary

Name: The Words
Credit: Dir: Brian Klugman, Lee Sternthal With: Bradley Cooper, Dennis Quaid, Olivia Wilde
Outline: A writer at the peak of his literary success discovers the steep price he must pay for stealing another man's work.

Name: The Adjustment Bureau
Credit: Dir: George Nolfi With: Matt Damon, Emily Blunt, Lisa Thoreson
Outline: The affair between a politician and a ballerina is affected by mysterious forces keeping the lovers apart.

Name: Enough Said

Name: Waitress

Outline: Jenna is a pregnant, unhappily married waitress in the deep south. She meets a newcomer to her town and falls into an unlikely relationship as a last attempt at happiness.

Name: Priceless

Outline: Through a set of wacky circumstances, a young gold digger mistakenly woos a mild-mannered bartender thinking he's a wealthy suitor.

Name: I Love You, Man

Outline: Friendless Peter Klaven goes on a series of man-dates to find a Best Man for his wedding. But, when his insta-bond with his new B.F.F. puts a strain on his relationship with his fiancÃ©e, can the trio learn to live happily ever after?

Name: Two Lovers
Credit: Dir: James Gray With: Joaquin Phoenix, Gwyneth Paltrow, Vinessa Shaw
Outline: A Brooklyn-set romantic drama about a bachelor torn between the family friend his parents wish he would marry and his beautiful but volatile new neighbor.

Name: P.S. I Love You

Outline: A young widow discovers that her late husband has left her 10 messages intended to help ease her pain and start a new life.

Name: Out of Sight

Name: Rent

Name: The Wackness

Name: Knocked Up

Name: Notting Hill

Outline: The life of a simple bookshop owner changes when he meets the most famous film star in the world.

Name: Wicker Park
Credit: Dir: Paul McGuigan With: Josh Hartnett, Diane Kruger, Matthew Lillard
Outline: A young Chicago advertising executive believes a woman he sees in a cafÃ© is his long-lost love. His belief leads to obsession, as he puts his life on hold in order to trail her.

Name: Maleficent
Credit: Dir: Robert Stromberg With: Angelina Jolie, Elle Fanning, Sharlto Copley
Outline: A vengeful fairy is driven to curse an infant princess, only to discover that the child may be the one person who can restore peace to their troubled land.

Name: Charlie Bartlett

Name: The Danish Girl

Name: Safety Not Guaranteed

Name: Curse of the Golden Flower

Name: Julie & Julia

Outline: Julia Child's story of her start in the cooking profession is intertwined with blogger Julie Powell's 2002 challenge to cook all the recipes in Child's first book.

Name: Another Earth

Outline: On the night of the discovery of a duplicate Earth in the Solar system, an ambitious young student and an accomplished composer cross paths in a tragic accident.

Name: The Cooler

Outline: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss' consternation.

Name: Public Enemies

Outline: The Feds try to take down notorious American gangsters John Dillinger, Baby Face Nelson and Pretty Boy Floyd during a booming crime wave in the 1930s.

Name: Cinderella
Credit: Dir: Kenneth Branagh With: Lily James, Cate Blanchett, Richard Madden
Outline: When her father unexpectedly passes away, young Ella finds herself at the mercy of her cruel stepmother and her scheming step-sisters. Never one to give up hope, Ella's fortunes begin to change after meeting a dashing stranger.

Name: Ghost
Credit: Dir: Jerry Zucker With: Patrick Swayze, Demi Moore, Whoopi Goldberg
Outline: After an accident leaves a young man dead, his spirit stays behind to warn his lover of impending danger, with the help of a reluctant psychic.

Name: What Dreams May Come
Credit: Dir: Vincent Ward With: Robin Williams, Cuba Gooding Jr., Annabella Sciorra
Outline: After he dies in a car crash, a man searches heaven and hell for his beloved wife.

Name: Wedding Crashers
Credit: Dir: David Dobkin With: Owen Wilson, Vince Vaughn, Rachel McAdams
Outline: John Beckwith and Jeremy Grey, a pair of committed womanizers who sneak into weddings to take advantage of the romantic tinge in the air, find themselves at odds with one another when John meets and falls for Claire Cleary.

Name: One Day

Name: Ever After: A Cinderella Story
Credit: Dir: Andy Tennant With: Drew Barrymore, Anjelica Huston, Dougray Scott
Outline: The "real" story of Cinderella. A refreshing new take on the classic fairy tale.

Name: An Officer and a Gentleman
Credit: Dir: Taylor Hackford With: Richard Gere, Debra Winger, David Keith
Outline: A young man must complete his work at a Navy Flight school to become an aviator, with the help of a tough gunnery sergeant and his new girlfriend.

Name: The First Time
Credit: Dir: Jon Kasdan With: Dylan O'Brien, Britt Robertson, Victoria Justice
Outline: A shy senior and a down-to-earth junior fall in love over the weekend.

Name: Starman
Credit: Dir: John Carpenter With: Jeff Bridges, Karen Allen, Charles Martin Smith
Outline: An alien takes the form of a young widow's husband and asks her to drive him from Wisconsin to Arizona. The government tries to stop them.

Name: Girl with a Pearl Earring
Credit: Dir: Peter Webber With: Scarlett Johansson, Colin Firth, Tom Wilkinson
Outline: A young peasant maid working in the house of painter Johannes Vermeer becomes his talented assistant and the model for one of his most famous works.

Name: Big Eyes

Name: Slow West

Outline: A young Scottish man travels across America in pursuit of the woman he loves, attracting the attention of an outlaw who is willing to serve as a guide.

Name: Coming to America

Outline: An African prince goes to Queens, New York City to find a wife whom he can respect for her intelligence and will.

Name: A Good Year

Outline: A British investment broker inherits his uncle's chateau and vineyard in Provence, where he spent much of his childhood. He discovers a new laid-back lifestyle as he tries to renovate the estate to be sold.

Name: Water for Elephants
Credit: Dir: Francis Lawrence With: Robert Pattinson, Reese Witherspoon, Christoph Waltz
Outline: Set in the 1930s, a former veterinary student takes a job in a traveling circus and falls in love with the ringmaster's wife.

Name: Grumpy Old Men
Credit: Dir: Donald Petrie With: Jack Lemmon, Walter Matthau, Ann-Margret
Outline: A lifelong feud between two neighbors since childhood only gets worse when a new female neighbor moves across the street.

Name: Romancing the Stone
Credit: Dir: Robert Zemeckis With: Michael Douglas, Kathleen Turner, Danny DeVito
Outline: A romance writer sets off to Colombia to ransom her kidnapped sister, and soon finds herself in the middle of a dangerous adventure.

Name: Vanilla Sky
Credit: Dir: Cameron Crowe With: Tom Cruise, PenÃ©lope Cruz, Cameron Diaz
Outline: A self-indulgent and vain publishing magnate finds his privileged life upended after a vehicular accident with a resentful lover.

Name: Pretty Woman
Credit: Dir: Garry Marshall With: Richard Gere, Julia Roberts, Jason Alexander
Outline: A man in a legal but hurtful business needs an escort for some social events, and hires a beautiful prostitute he meets... only to fall in love.

Name: Warm Bodies
Credit: Dir: Jonathan Levine With: Nicholas Hoult, Teresa Palmer, John Malkovich
Outline: After a highly unusual zombie saves a still-living girl from an attack, the two form a relationship that sets in motion events that might transform the entire lifeless world.

Name: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
Credit: Dir: Kevin Reynolds With: Kevin Costner, Morgan Freeman, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio
Outline: When Robin and his Moorish companion come to England and the tyranny of the Sheriff of Nottingham, he decides to fight back as an outlaw.

Name: Elf

Outline: After inadvertently wreaking havoc on the elf community due to his ungainly size, a man raised as an elf at the North Pole is sent to the U.S. in search of his true identity.

Name: Lolita
Credit: Dir: Adrian Lyne With: Jeremy Irons, Dominique Swain, Melanie Griffith
Outline: A man marries his landlady so he can take advantage of her daughter.

Name: Peter Pan
Credit: Dir: P.J. Hogan With: Jeremy Sumpter, Jason Isaacs, Olivia Williams
Outline: The Darling family children receive a visit from Peter Pan, who takes them to Never Never Land where an ongoing war with the evil Pirate Captain Hook is taking place.

Name: The Holiday
Credit: Dir: Nancy Meyers With: Kate Winslet, Cameron Diaz, Jude Law
Outline: Two women troubled with guy-problems swap homes in each other's countries, where they each meet a local guy and fall in love.

Name: The Duchess
Credit: Dir: Saul Dibb With: Keira Knightley, Ralph Fiennes, Dominic Cooper
Outline: A chronicle of the life of 18th century aristocrat Georgiana, Duchess of Devonshire, who was reviled for her extravagant political and personal life.

Name: The Majestic
Credit: Dir: Frank Darabont With: Jim Carrey, Martin Landau, Bob Balaban
Outline: Set in 1951, a blacklisted Hollywood writer gets into a car accident, loses his memory and settles down in a small town where he is mistaken for a long-lost son.

Name: Mrs. Doubtfire
Credit: Dir: Chris Columbus With: Robin Williams, Sally Field, Pierce Brosnan
Outline: After a bitter divorce, an actor disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with his children held in custody by his former wife.

Name: A Knight's Tale
Credit: Dir: Brian Helgeland With: Heath Ledger, Mark Addy, Rufus Sewell
Outline: After his master dies, a peasant squire, fueled by his desire for food and glory, creates a new identity for himself as a knight.

Name: The Hunchback of Notre Dame

Outline: A deformed bell-ringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancer.

Name: The Road to El Dorado

Outline: Two swindlers get their hands on a map to the fabled city of gold, El Dorado.

Name: Dirty Dancing
Credit: Dir: Emile Ardolino With: Patrick Swayze, Jennifer Grey, Jerry Orbach
Outline: Spending the summer at a Catskills resort with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor, Johnny Castle.

Name: Jab Tak Hai Jaan

Outline: After finding and losing his true love in London, Samar Anand defies death by becoming a bomb disposal expert for the Indian Army. Returning to London after 10 years, he suffers amnesia after an accident. Will he be reunited with his love?

Name: Tristan + Isolde
Credit: Dir: Kevin Reynolds With: James Franco, Sophia Myles, Rufus Sewell
Outline: An affair between the second in line to Britain's throne (Franco) and the princess of the feuding Irish (Myles) spells doom for the young lovers.

Name: Serendipity
Credit: Dir: Peter Chelsom With: John Cusack, Kate Beckinsale, Jeremy Piven
Outline: A couple reunite years after the night they first met, fell in love, and separated, convinced that one day they'd end up together.

Name: The Island

Outline: Lincoln Six Echo is just like everyone else - he's waiting to go to the Island, the only place left in the world to actually live a life...

Name: Top Gun

Name: The Brothers Bloom

Name: Odd Thomas
Credit: Dir: Stephen Sommers With: Anton Yelchin, Ashley Sommers, Leonor Varela
Outline: In a California desert town, a short-order cook with clairvoyant abilities encounters a mysterious man with a link to dark, threatening forces.

Name: Cruel Intentions

Outline: Two wealthy step-siblings of an elite Manhattan prep school make a wager: to de-flower the new headmaster's daughter before the start of term.

Name: Great Expectations
Credit: Dir: Alfonso CuarÃ³n With: Ethan Hawke, Gwyneth Paltrow, Hank Azaria
Outline: Modernization of Charles Dickens classic story finds the hapless Finn as a painter in New York pursuing his unrequited and haughty childhood love.

Name: Adventures in Babysitting

Credit: Dir: Chris Columbus With: Elisabeth Shue, Maia Brewton, Keith Coogan

Name: Cypher

Outline: An unsuspecting, disenchanted man finds himself working as a spy in the dangerous, high-stakes world of corporate espionage. Quickly getting way over-his-head, he teams up with a mysterious femme fatale.

Name: 2 Days in Paris

Outline: Marion and Jack try to rekindle their relationship with a visit to Paris, home of Marion's parents -- and several of her ex-boyfriends.

Name: Yes Man

Outline: A guy challenges himself to say "yes" to everything for an entire year.

Name: Happythankyoumoreplease
Credit: Dir: Josh Radnor With: Josh Radnor, Malin Akerman, Zoe Kazan
Outline: Captures a generational moment - young people on the cusp of truly growing up, tiring of their reflexive cynicism, each in their own ways struggling to connect and define what it means to love and be loved.

Name: What If

Outline: Wallace, who is burned out from a string of failed relationships, forms an instant bond with Chantry, who lives with her longtime boyfriend. Together, they puzzle out what it means if your best friend is also the love of your life.

Name: Everyone Says I Love You

Outline: A New York girl sets her father up with a beautiful woman in a shaky marriage while her half sister gets engaged.

Name: The Vow
Credit: Dir: Michael Sucsy With: Rachel McAdams, Channing Tatum, Sam Neill
Outline: A car accident puts Paige in a coma, and when she wakes up with severe memory loss, her husband Leo works to win her heart again.

Name: Liar Liar

Outline: A fast track lawyer can't lie for 24 hours due to his son's birthday wish after the lawyer turns his son down for the last time.

Name: Bridesmaids

Outline: Competition between the maid of honor and a bridesmaid, over who is the bride's best friend, threatens to upend the life of an out-of-work pastry chef.

Name: Salmon Fishing in the Yemen
Credit: Dir: Lasse HallstrÃ¶m With: Ewan McGregor, Emily Blunt, Amr Waked
Outline: A fisheries expert is approached by a consultant to help realize a sheik's vision of bringing the sport of fly-fishing to the desert and embarks on an upstream journey of faith and fish to prove the impossible possible.

Name: The Wedding Singer

Outline: Robbie, the singer and Julia, the waitress are both engaged to be married but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

Name: The Devil Wears Prada

Name: Penelope

Name: Risky Business

Name: 50 First Dates

Name: The Lake House

Name: Dan in Real Life

Name: Emma
Credit: Dir: Douglas McGrath With: Gwyneth Paltrow, James Cosmo, Greta Scacchi
Outline: In rural 1800s England things go bad for a young matchmaker after she finds a man for another woman.

Name: Man Up
Credit: Dir: Ben Palmer With: Lake Bell, Simon Pegg, Ophelia Lovibond
Outline: A single woman takes the place of a stranger's blind date, which leads to her finding the perfect boyfriend.

Name: The War of the Roses
Credit: Dir: Danny DeVito With: Michael Douglas, Kathleen Turner, Danny DeVito

Name: Clueless

Name: Sliding Doors

Name: Don Juan DeMarco

Name: Where the Heart Is

Name: Sweet November

As the pair drive 2,000 head of cattle over unforgiving landscape, they experience the bombing of Darwin, Australia, by Japanese forces firsthand.

Name: Friends with Benefits

Name: Focus

Name: It's Complicated

Outline: A young Greek woman falls in love with a non-Greek and struggles to get her family to accept him while she comes to terms with her heritage and cultural identity.

Name: Flyboys

Name: Bandits

Name: Blast from the Past

Name: Hollywoodland

Name: Letters to Juliet

Name: The Horse Whisperer

Name: French Kiss

Name: For Love of the Game

Name: Step Up

Name: You've Got Mail

Name: Music and Lyrics

Name: Melinda and Melinda

Outline: Two alternating stories about Melinda's (Mitchell) attempts to straighten out her life.

Name: Blended

Outline: After a bad blind date, a man and woman find themselves stuck together at a resort for families, where their attraction grows as their respective kids benefit from the burgeoning relationship.

Name: Far and Away
Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Tom Cruise, Nicole Kidman, Thomas Gibson
Outline: A young man leaves Ireland with his landlord's daughter after some trouble with her father, and they...

Name: Casanova

Name: The Last Kiss
Credit: Dir: Tony Goldwyn With: Zach Braff, Jacinda Barrett, Rachel Bilson
Outline: Michael and Jenna, having been a couple for three years, want to get married and start a family. These...

Name: Bedtime Stories

Name: Wild Child

Name: The Mexican

Name: Uptown Girls

Name: Birth

Name: Shall We Dance

Name: The Switch
Credit: Dir: Josh Gordon, Will Speck With: Jennifer Aniston, Jason Bateman, Patrick Wilson

Name: Dragonfly
Credit: Dir: Tom Shadyac With: Kevin Costner, Susanna Thompson, Joe Morton
Outline: A grieving doctor is being contacted by his late wife through his patients near death experiences.

Name: Dick Tracy
Credit: Dir: Warren Beatty With: Warren Beatty, Madonna, Al Pacino
Outline: The comic strip detective finds his life vastly complicated when Breathless Mahoney makes advances towards him while he is trying to battle Big Boy Caprice's united mob.

Name: The Jewel of the Nile
Credit: Dir: Lewis Teague With: Michael Douglas, Kathleen Turner, Danny DeVito
Outline: This is the sequel to "Romancing the Stone" where Jack and Joan have their yacht and easy life, but...

Name: Two Weeks Notice
Credit: Dir: Marc Lawrence With: Sandra Bullock, Hugh Grant, Alicia Witt
Outline: A lawyer decides that she's used too much like a nanny by her boss, so she walks out on him.

Name: Larry Crowne
Credit: Dir: Tom Hanks With: Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts, Sarah Mahoney
Outline: After losing his job, a middle-aged man reinvents himself by going back to college.

Name: Baby Mama
Credit: Dir: Michael McCullers With: Tina Fey, Amy Poehler, Sigourney Weaver

Name: Pearl Harbor
Credit: Dir: Michael Bay With: Ben Affleck, Kate Beckinsale, Josh Hartnett

Name: What's Your Number?
Credit: Dir: Mark Mylod With: Anna Faris, Chris Evans, Ari Graynor
Outline: A woman looks back at the past nineteen men she's had relationships with in her life and wonders if one of them might be her one true love.

Name: Leatherheads

Outline: In 1925, an enterprising pro football player convinces America's too-good-to-be-true college football hero to play for his team and keep the league from going under.

Name: The Other Woman

Name: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry

Name: Fools Rush In
Credit: Dir: Andy Tennant With: Matthew Perry, Salma Hayek, Jon Tenney

Name: The Tourist
Credit: Dir: Florian Henckel von Donnersmarck With: Johnny Depp, Angelina Jolie, Paul Bettany

Name: Original Sin
Credit: Dir: Michael Cristofer With: Antonio Banderas, Angelina Jolie, Thomas Jane
Outline: A woman along with her lover, plan to con a rich man by marrying him and on earning his trust running away with all his money. Everything goes as planned until she actually begins to fall in love with him.

Name: Never Been Kissed
Credit: Dir: Raja Gosnell With: Drew Barrymore, David Arquette, Michael Vartan

Name: Raising Helen
Credit: Dir: Garry Marshall With: Kate Hudson, John Corbett, Joan Cusack

Name: Gnomeo & Juliet

Name: Bedazzled

Name: Something Borrowed

Name: Spread

Name: Shallow Hal
Credit: Dir: Bobby Farrelly, Peter Farrelly With: Jack Black, Gwyneth Paltrow, Jason Alexander
Outline: A shallow man falls in love with a 300 pound woman because of her "inner beauty".

Name: Must Love Dogs

Name: 9½ Weeks

Outline: A woman gets involved in an impersonal affair with a man. She barely knows about his life, only about the sex games they play, so the relationship begins to get complicated.

Name: My Best Friend's Girl

Name: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
Credit: Dir: Beeban Kidron With: RenÃ©e Zellweger, Colin Firth, Hugh Grant
Outline: After finding love, Bridget Jones questions if she really has everything she's dreamed of having.

Name: The Host

Name: Rock of Ages

Name: Guess Who

Name: Captain Corelli's Mandolin

Name: The Karate Kid, Part II
Credit: Dir: John G. Avildsen With: Pat Morita, Ralph Macchio, Pat E. Johnson

Name: Saving Silverman

Outline: A pair of buddies conspire to save their best friend from marrying the wrong woman.

Name: A Cinderella Story
Credit: Dir: Mark Rosman With: Hilary Duff, Chad Michael Murray, Jennifer Coolidge

Name: Nine

Name: Confessions of a Shopaholic

Outline: A college grad lands a job as a financial journalist in New York City to support where she nurtures her shopping addiction and falls for a wealthy entrepreneur.

Name: Footloose

Outline: City teenager Ren MacCormack moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.

Name: What a Girl Wants

Name: Passengers
Credit: Dir: Rodrigo GarcÃ­a With: Anne Hathaway, Patrick Wilson, David Morse
Outline: A grief counselor working with a group of plane-crash survivors finds herself at the root of a mystery when her clients begin to disappear.

Name: Made of Honor
Credit: Dir: Paul Weiland With: Patrick Dempsey, Michelle Monaghan, Kevin McKidd

Name: The Last Song

Name: The Heartbreak Kid

Outline: A newly wed man who believes he's just gotten hitched to the perfect woman encounters another lady on his honeymoon.

Name: The Break-Up

Outline: In a bid to keep their luxurious condo from their significant other, a couple's break-up proceeds to get uglier and nastier by the moment.

Name: Mickey Blue Eyes

Outline: An English auctioneer proposes to the daughter of a mafia kingpin, only to realize that certain "favors" would be asked of him.

Name: She's All That
Credit: Dir: Robert Iscove With: Freddie Prinze Jr., Rachael Leigh Cook, Matthew Lillard
Outline: A high school jock makes a bet that he can turn an unattractive girl into the school's prom queen.

Name: Cocktail

Name: Look Who's Talking

Name: Indecent Proposal
Credit: Dir: Adrian Lyne With: Robert Redford, Demi Moore, Woody Harrelson
Outline: A Millionaire offers a $1,000,000 to a young married lovely couple for a night with the wife.

Name: You Again
Credit: Dir: Andy Fickman With: Kristen Bell, Odette Annable, Sigourney Weaver
Outline: When a young woman realizes her brother is about to marry the girl who bullied her in high school, she sets out to expose the fiancÃ©e's true colors.

Name: Mr. Deeds

Outline: A sweet-natured, small-town guy inherits a controlling stake in a media conglomerate and begins to do business his way.

Name: The Three Musketeers

Name: John Tucker Must Die

Name: Arthur
Credit: Dir: Jason Winer With: Russell Brand, Helen Mirren, Jennifer Garner

Name: Valentine's Day

Name: Ghosts of Girlfriends Past

Name: Admission

Name: Six Days Seven Nights

Name: I Give It a Year

Outline: Newlywed couple Nat and Josh are deliriously happy despite their differences, though friends and family aren't convinced that they can last. With their first anniversary approaching and attractive alternatives in the mix, can they last?

Name: Reindeer Games
Credit: Dir: John Frankenheimer With: Ben Affleck, Gary Sinise, Charlize Theron
Outline: After assuming his dead cellmate's identity to get with his girlfriend, an ex-con finds himself the reluctant participant in a casino heist.

Name: America's Sweethearts

Name: The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement

Outline: Now settled in Genovia, Princess Mia faces a new revelation: she is being primed for an arranged marriage to an English suitor.

Name: What to Expect When You're Expecting

Name: Joe Versus the Volcano

Outline: When a hypochondriac learns that he is dying, he accepts an offer to throw himself in a volcano at a tropical island, and along the way there, learns to truly live.

Name: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo

Outline: A man becomes a male gigolo after being mistaken for one while housesitting a male gigolo's house.

Name: The Blue Lagoon

Name: Eat Pray Love

Name: New Year's Eve

Outline: The lives of several couples and singles in New York intertwine over the course of New Year's Eve.

Name: Four Christmases
Credit: Dir: Seth Gordon With: Reese Witherspoon, Vince Vaughn, Mary Steenburgen
Outline: A couple struggles to visit all four of their divorced parents on Christmas.

Name: Drumline
Credit: Dir: Charles Stone III With: Nick Cannon, Zoe Saldana, Orlando Jones
Outline: A band director recruits a Harlem street drummer to play at a Southern university.

Name: Fool's Gold
Credit: Dir: Andy Tennant With: Matthew McConaughey, Kate Hudson, Donald Sutherland

Name: Blue Crush
Credit: Dir: John Stockwell With: Kate Bosworth, Michelle Rodriguez, Matthew Davis
Outline: As a hard-core surfer girl prepares for a big competition, she finds herself falling for a football player.

Name: 40 Days and 40 Nights
Credit: Dir: Michael Lehmann With: Josh Hartnett, Shannyn Sossamon, Paulo Costanzo
Outline: After a brutal break-up, a young man vows to stay celibate during the forty days of Lent, but finds the girl of his dreams and is unable to do anything about it.

Name: You, Me and Dupree
Credit: Dir: Anthony Russo, Joe Russo With: Kate Hudson, Owen Wilson, Matt Dillon
Outline: A best man (Wilson) stays on as a houseguest with the newlyweds, much to the couple's annoyance.

Name: Coyote Ugly
Credit: Dir: David McNally With: Piper Perabo, Adam Garcia, John Goodman
Outline: Aspiring songwriter Violet Sanford, after getting a job at a women-run NYC bar that teases its male patrons, comes out of her shell.

Name: Because I Said So
Credit: Dir: Michael Lehmann With: Diane Keaton, Mandy Moore, Gabriel Macht
Outline: A meddling mother tries to set her daughter up with the right man so her kid won't follow in her footsteps.

Name: Failure to Launch
Credit: Dir: Tom Dey With: Matthew McConaughey, Sarah Jessica Parker, Kathy Bates
Outline: A thirtysomething slacker suspects his parents of setting him up with his dream girl so he'll finally vacate their home.

Name: Good Luck Chuck
Credit: Dir: Mark Helfrich With: Dane Cook, Jessica Alba, Dan Fogler
Outline: In order to keep the woman of his dreams from falling for another guy, Charlie Logan has to break the curse that has made him wildly popular with single women: Sleep with Charlie once, and the next man you meet will be your true love.

Name: The Benchwarmers

Outline: A trio of guys try and make up for missed opportunities in childhood by forming a three-player baseball team to compete against standard children baseball squads.

Name: Beastly

Outline: A modern-day take on the "Beauty and the Beast" tale where a New York teen is transformed into a hideous monster in order to find true love.

Name: Pompeii

Name: The Nutty Professor
Credit: Dir: Tom Shadyac With: Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn
Outline: Grossly overweight professor Sherman Klump, desperate to lose weight, takes a special chemical that turns him into the slim but obnoxious Buddy Love.

Name: Kicking & Screaming

Outline: Family man Phil Weston, a lifelong victim of his father's competitive nature, takes on the coaching duties of a kids' soccer team, and soon finds that he's also taking on his father's dysfunctional way of relating...

Name: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 2

Outline: After the birth of Renesmee, the Cullens gather other vampire clans in order to protect the child from a false allegation that puts the family in front of the Volturi.

Name: Alexander

Credit: Dir: Oliver Stone With: Colin Farrell, Anthony Hopkins, Rosario Dawson
Outline: Alexander, the King of Macedonia and one of the greatest military leaders in the history of warfare, conquers much of the known world.

Name: Mortdecai

Name: When in Rome

Name: The Bounty Hunter

Outline: A bounty hunter learns that his next target is his ex-wife, a reporter working on a murder cover-up. Soon after their reunion, the always-at-odds duo find themselves on a run-for-their-lives adventure.

Name: Sex and the City

Name: The House Bunny

Name: Rumor Has It...

Name: Employee of the Month

Outline: A slacker competes with a repeat winner for the "Employee of the Month" title at work, in order to gain the affections of a new female employee.

Name: Little Fockers

Name: MacGruber

Name: Runaway Bride

Outline: A reporter is assigned to write a story about a woman who has left a string of fiances at the altar.

Name: Aloha

Name: Just Married

Outline: A young newlywed couple honeymoon in Europe, where obstacles challenge their ability to sustain the marriage.

Name: The Specialist
Credit: Dir: Luis Llosa With: Sylvester Stallone, Sharon Stone, James Woods
Outline: A woman entices a bomb expert she's involved with into destroying the mafia that killed her family.

Name: George of the Jungle
Credit: Dir: Sam Weisman With: Brendan Fraser, Leslie Mann, Thomas Haden Church
Outline: George grows up in the jungle raised by apes. Based on the Cartoon series.

Name: Nine Months
Credit: Dir: Chris Columbus With: Hugh Grant, Julianne Moore, Tom Arnold

Name: Bride Wars

Outline: Two best friends become rivals when they schedule their respective weddings on the same day.

Name: Killers

Name: Forces of Nature

Outline: A soon-to-be-married man encounters an exciting stranger after his plane suffers an accident on takeoff.

Name: How Do You Know

Name: Bride of Chucky

Outline: Chucky, the doll possessed by a serial killer, discovers the perfect mate to kill and revive into the body of another doll.

Name: I Love You, Beth Cooper
Credit: Dir: Chris Columbus With: Hayden Panettiere, Paul Rust, Jack Carpenter
Outline: A nerdy valedictorian proclaims his love for the hottest and most popular girl in school - Beth Cooper - during his graduation speech. Much to his surprise, Beth shows up at his door that very night and decides to show him the best night of his life.

Name: Just My Luck
Credit: Dir: Donald Petrie With: Lindsay Lohan, Chris Pine, Samaire Armstrong
Outline: Manhattanite Ashley is known to many as the luckiest woman around. After a chance encounter with a down-and-out young man, however, she realizes that she's swapped her fortune for his.

Name: The Lizzie McGuire Movie
Credit: Dir: Jim Fall With: Hilary Duff, Adam Lamberg, Clayton Snyder
Outline: Lizzie McGuire has graduated from middle school and takes a trip to Rome, Italy with her class. And what was supposed to be only a normal trip, becomes a teenager's dream come true.

Name: Bachelorette
Credit: Dir: Leslye Headland With: Kirsten Dunst, Isla Fisher, Lizzy Caplan
Outline: Three friends are asked to be bridesmaids at a wedding of a woman they used to ridicule back in high school.

Name: One for the Money
Credit: Dir: Julie Anne Robinson With: Katherine Heigl, Jason O'Mara, Daniel Sunjata
Outline: Unemployed and newly-divorced Stephanie Plum lands a job at her cousin's bail-bond business, where her first assignment puts her on the trail of a wanted local cop from her romantic past.

Name: The Back-up Plan
Credit: Dir: Alan Poul With: Jennifer Lopez, Alex O'Loughlin, Michaela Watkins
Outline: A romantic comedy centered on a woman who conceives twins through artificial insemination, only to meet the man of her dreams on the very same day.

Name: Aquamarine
Credit: Dir: Elizabeth Allen Rosenbaum With: Emma Roberts, Joanna 'JoJo' Levesque, Sara Paxton
Outline: Two teenage girls discover a mermaid in their beach club's swimming pool.

Name: Sleeping Beauty
Credit: Dir: Julia Leigh With: Emily Browning, Rachael Blake, Ewen Leslie
Outline: A haunting portrait of Lucy, a young university student drawn into a mysterious hidden world of unspoken desires.

Name: Honey
Credit: Dir: Bille Woodruff With: Jessica Alba, Mekhi Phifer, Romeo Miller
Outline: Honey is a sexy, tough music video choreographer who shakes up her life after her mentor gives her an ultimatum: sleep with him or be blacklisted within their industry.

Name: License to Wed
Credit: Dir: Ken Kwapis With: Mandy Moore, John Krasinski, Robin Williams
Outline: A reverend puts an engaged couple through a grueling marriage preparation course to see if they are meant to be married in his church.

Name: The Wedding Planner
Credit: Dir: Adam Shankman With: Jennifer Lopez, Matthew McConaughey, Bridgette Wilson-Sampras
Outline: Mary Fiore is San Francisco's most successful supplier of romance and glamor. She knows all the tricks. She knows all the rules. But then she breaks the most important rule of all: she falls in love with the groom.

Name: Twilight
Credit: Dir: Catherine Hardwicke With: Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson, Billy Burke
Outline: A teenage girl risks everything when she falls in love with a vampire.

Name: Zookeeper
Credit: Dir: Frank Coraci With: Kevin James, Rosario Dawson, Leslie Bibb
Outline: A group of zoo animals decide to break their code of silence in order to help their lovable zoo keeper find love -- without opting to leave his current job for something more illustrious.

Name: Mr. Woodcock
Credit: Dir: Craig Gillespie With: Billy Bob Thornton, Seann William Scott, Susan Sarandon
Outline: Taken aback by his mother's wedding announcement, a young man returns home in an effort to stop her from marrying his old high school gym teacher, a man who made high school hell for generations of students.

Name: My Super Ex-Girlfriend
Credit: Dir: Ivan Reitman With: Uma Thurman, Luke Wilson, Anna Faris
Outline: When a regular guy dumps a superhero for her neediness, she uses her powers to make his life a living hell.

Name: The Sweetest Thing
Credit: Dir: Roger Kumble With: Cameron Diaz, Thomas Jane, Christina Applegate
Outline: A girl finds she is forced to educate herself on the etiquette of wooing the opposite sex when she finally meets Mr. Right.

Name: [REC] 3: Genesis
Credit: Dir: Paco Plaza With: Leticia Dolera, Diego MartÃ­n, Ismael MartÃ­nez
Outline: A couple's wedding day turns horrific as some of the guests start showing signs of a strange illness.

Name: Agent Cody Banks
Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Crime | Family | Romance | Thriller
Credit: Dir: Harald Zwart With: Frankie Muniz, Hilary Duff, Andrew Francis
Outline: A government agent trains Cody Banks in the ways of covert operations that require younger participants.

Name: Maid in Manhattan
Credit: Dir: Wayne Wang With: Jennifer Lopez, Ralph Fiennes, Natasha Richardson
Outline: A senatorial candidate falls for a hotel maid, thinking she is a socialite when he sees her trying on a wealthy woman's dress.

Name: Meet Dave
Credit: Dir: Brian Robbins With: Eddie Murphy, Elizabeth Banks, Gabrielle Union
Outline: A crew of miniature aliens operate a spaceship that has a human form. While trying to save their planet, the aliens encounter a new problem, as their ship becomes smitten with an Earth woman.

Name: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
Credit: Dir: David Slade With: Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson, Taylor Lautner
Outline: As a string of mysterious killings grips Seattle, Bella, whose high school graduation is fast approaching, is forced to choose between her love for vampire Edward and her friendship with werewolf Jacob.

Name: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 1
Credit: Dir: Bill Condon With: Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson, Taylor Lautner
Outline: The Quileutes close in on expecting parents Edward and Bella, whose unborn child poses a threat to the Wolf Pack and the towns people of Forks.

Name: All About Steve
Credit: Dir: Phil Traill With: Sandra Bullock, Bradley Cooper, Thomas Haden Church
Outline: Convinced that a CCN cameraman is her true love, an eccentric crossword puzzler trails him as he travels all over the country, hoping to convince him that they belong together.

Name: Bewitched
Credit: Dir: Nora Ephron With: Nicole Kidman, Will Ferrell, Shirley MacLaine
Outline: Thinking he can overshadow an unknown actress in the part, an egocentric actor unknowingly gets a witch cast in an upcoming television remake of the classic sitcom Bewitched .

Name: Herbie Fully Loaded
Genre: Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Romance | Sport
Credit: Dir: Angela Robinson With: Lindsay Lohan, Michael Keaton, Cheryl Hines
Outline: Maggie Peyton, the new owner of Number 53 - the free-wheelin' Volkswagen bug with a mind of its own - puts the car through its paces on the road to becoming a NASCAR competitor.

Name: Did You Hear About the Morgans?
Credit: Dir: Marc Lawrence With: Hugh Grant, Sarah Jessica Parker, Sam Elliott
Outline: In New York City, an estranged couple who witness a murder are relocated to small-town Wyoming as part of a witness-protection program.

Name: Honey I Blew Up the Kid
Credit: Dir: Randal Kleiser With: Rick Moranis, Marcia Strassman, Robert Oliveri
Outline: The Szalinski family is back, this time hilarious disaster strikes when an experiment causes their new toddler son to grow many stories tall.

Name: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
Credit: Dir: Chris Weitz With: Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson, Taylor Lautner
Outline: Edward leaves Bella after an attack that nearly claimed her life, and in her depression she falls into yet another paranormal relationship- this time with werewolf Jacob Black.

Name: Howard the Duck
Credit: Dir: Willard Huyck With: Lea Thompson, Jeffrey Jones, Tim Robbins
Outline: A sarcastic humanoid duck is pulled from his homeworld to Earth where he must stop an alien invader.

Name: Junior
Credit: Dir: Ivan Reitman With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Danny DeVito, Emma Thompson
Outline: As part of a fertility research project, a male scientist agrees to carry a pregnancy in his own body.

Name: Look Who's Talking Too
Credit: Dir: Amy Heckerling With: John Travolta, Kirstie Alley, Olympia Dukakis
Outline: This time, a new baby is on the way, and it's a girl. Wrapped together with the standard conflict between mother and father, Mikey engages in a bit of sibling rivalry with his new sister.

Name: High School Musical 3: Senior Year
Genre: Comedy | Drama | Family | Music | Musical | Romance
Credit: Dir: Kenny Ortega With: Zac Efron, Vanessa Hudgens, Ashley Tisdale
Outline: As seniors in high school, Troy and Gabriella struggle with the idea of being separated from one another as college approaches. Along with the rest of the Wildcats, they stage a spring musical to address their experiences, hopes and fears about their future.

Name: In the Land of Blood and Honey
Credit: Dir: Angelina Jolie With: Zana Marjanovic, Goran Kostic, Rade Serbedzija
Outline: During the Bosnian War, Danijel, a soldier fighting for the Serbs, re-encounters Ajla, a Bosnian who's now a captive in his camp he oversees. Their once promising connection has become ambiguous as their motives have changed.

Name: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
Credit: Dir: Peter Segal With: Eddie Murphy, Janet Jackson, Larry Miller
Outline: Scientist Sherman Klump's inventions, his upcoming marriage to his pretty colleague Denise Gaines and his reputation are threatened by his evil clone Buddy Love.

Name: Sex and the City 2
Credit: Dir: Michael Patrick King With: Sarah Jessica Parker, Kim Cattrall, Kristin Davis
Outline: While wrestling with the pressures of life, love, and work in Manhattan, Carrie, Miranda, and Charlotte join Samantha for a trip to Abu Dhabi (United Arab Emirates), where Samantha's ex is filming a new movie.

Name: LOL
Credit: Dir: Lisa Azuelos With: Miley Cyrus, Douglas Booth, Ashley Greene
Outline: As a new year at school begins, Lola's heart is broken by her boyfriend, though soon she's surprised by her best friend, promising musician Kyle, who reveals his feelings for her.

Name: Grease 2
Credit: Dir: Patricia Birch With: Michelle Pfeiffer, Maxwell Caulfield, Lorna Luft
Outline: An English student at a 1960's American high school has to prove himself to the leader of a girls' gang whose members can only date greasers.

Name: Hannah Montana: The Movie
Credit: Dir: Peter Chelsom With: Miley Cyrus, Emily Osment, Billy Ray Cyrus
Outline: As Hannah Montana's popularity begins to take over her life, Miley Stewart, on the urging from her father takes a trip to her hometown of Crowley Corners, Tennessee to get some perspective on what matters in life the most.

Name: Fifty Shades of Grey
Credit: Dir: Sam Taylor-Johnson With: Dakota Johnson, Jamie Dornan, Jennifer Ehle
Outline: Literature student Anastasia Steele's life changes forever when she meets handsome, yet tormented, billionaire Christian Grey.

Name: Stop! Or My Mom Will Shoot
Credit: Dir: Roger Spottiswoode With: Sylvester Stallone, Estelle Getty, JoBeth Williams
Outline: A tough police sergeant's mother comes to visit him and begins to meddle in his life and career.

Name: Norbit
Credit: Dir: Brian Robbins With: Eddie Murphy, Thandie Newton, Terry Crews
Outline: A mild-mannered guy, who is engaged to a monstrous woman, meets the woman of his dreams, and schemes to find a way to be with her.

Name: The Love Guru
Credit: Dir: Marco Schnabel With: Mike Myers, Jessica Alba, Romany Malco
Outline: Pitka an American raised outside of his country by gurus, returns to the States in order to break into the self-help business. His first challenge: To settle the romantic troubles and subsequent professional skid of a star hockey player whose wife left him for a rival athlete.

Name: Speed 2: Cruise Control
Credit: Dir: Jan de Bont With: Sandra Bullock, Jason Patric, Willem Dafoe
Outline: A computer hacker breaks into the computer system of the Seabourn Legend cruise liner and sets it speeding on a collision course into a gigantic oil tanker.

Name: Catwoman
Credit: Dir: Pitof With: Halle Berry, Sharon Stone, Benjamin Bratt
Outline: A shy woman, endowed with the speed, reflexes, and senses of a cat, walks a thin line between criminal and hero, even as a detective doggedly pursues her, fascinated by both of her personas.

Name: Crossroads
Credit: Dir: Tamra Davis With: Britney Spears, Anson Mount, Zoe Saldana
Outline: Three childhood best friends, and a guy they just met, take a road trip across the country, finding themselves and their friendship in the process.

Name: Date Movie
Credit: Dir: Aaron Seltzer With: Alyson Hannigan, Fred Willard, Jennifer Coolidge
Outline: Spoof of romantic comedies which focuses on a man, his crush, his parents, and her father.

Name: Celal and Ceren
Credit: Dir: Togan GÃ¶kbakar With: Sahan GÃ¶kbakar, Ezgi Mola, Dilsah Demir
Outline: Celal, who dreams of achieving happiness as a ladies' man and charmer, soon gets into difficulties and suffers misfortune. Back when Celal was in a relationship, he was jealous of the life of a bachelor.

Name: Gigli
Credit: Dir: Martin Brest With: Ben Affleck, Jennifer Lopez, Justin Bartha
Outline: The violent story about how a criminal lesbian, a tough-guy hit-man with a heart of gold, and a mentally challenged man came to be best friends through a hostage.

Name: Gunday
Credit: Dir: Ali Abbas Zafar With: Ranveer Singh, Arjun Kapoor, Priyanka Chopra
Outline: Two childhood friends travel from Bangladesh to Calcutta during the turbulent 1970s, becoming criminal superstars who both fall for a cabaret dancer.

Name: The Hottie & the Nottie
Credit: Dir: Tom Putnam With: Paris Hilton, Joel David Moore, Christine Lakin
Outline: Nate moves to L.A. to track down Cristabel, the woman he's been in love with since childhood, only to discover that his plan to woo her only has one hurdle to overcome: what to do with June, Cristabel's ever-present, not-so-hot best friend? What's even more complicating is Nate's growing feelings for June, whose true beauty starts to emerge.
